text: "Want to Want Me" is a 2015 song by American singer Jason Derulo and is the lead single from his fourth studio album Everything Is 4. It topped the single charts in Austria, Israel, South Africa and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Canada, the Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Lebanon, Mexico, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Switzerland and the United States. == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Jason Derulo songs
title: Want to Want Me
